title: The Great commanders
creator_credit: Phil Grabsky and Seventh Art Productions
brief_description: A six part series which looks at six individuals considered to be military giants. Their motivation and the qualities which made them great commanders are analysed by experts. 3D computer animation is used to illustrate each commander’s particular skill in battle. Each program takes as its focus a key battle which examines the nature of each individual’s military command.
